## Salary Data

The Fort Collins Police Department reports 
`r salaries %>% filter(department == 'patrol') %>% summarize(count = n())`
employees on staff in 2015. Of those employees the highest paid position is the
`r salaries %>% filter(department == 'patrol') %>% top_n(1) %>% select(jobTitle)` with
an annual salary of 
`r paste("$", salaries %>% filter(department == 'patrol') %>% top_n(1) %>% select(earnings2015), sep = "")`.
